statements: SELECT * FROM painting_competition
SELECT participant_name, score FROM painting_competition ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM painting_competition WHERE score > 80
SELECT participant_name, judging_criteria FROM painting_competition WHERE winner = TRUE
SELECT * FROM painting_competition WHERE participant_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM painting_competition WHERE winner = TRUE ORDER BY participant_name DESC
SELECT participant_name, score FROM painting_competition WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, participant_email FROM painting_competition WHERE judging_criteria LIKE '%creativity%'
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM painting_competition WHERE participant_name LIKE 'J%' AND participant_email IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM painting_competition WHERE score BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY score
SELECT * FROM competition_participants;
SELECT participant_name, painting_title FROM competition_participants;
SELECT * FROM competition_participants WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT painting_title, participant_name FROM competition_participants ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
SELECT judge_name, judging_criteria FROM competition_judges;
SELECT * FROM competition_participants WHERE participant_name = 'Alice'
SELECT painting_title, painting_theme FROM competition_participants WHERE participant_id = 1
SELECT participant_name, painting_title FROM competition_participants WHERE painting_theme = 'Abstract'
SELECT * FROM competition_judges WHERE judging_experience > 5 ORDER BY judge_name DESC
SELECT judge_name, judging_criteria FROM competition_judges WHERE judge_id = 3
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_name, email FROM participants;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, email FROM participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM judging_criteria;
SELECT criteria_id, criteria_description FROM judging_criteria WHERE criteria_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE participant_name = 'Alice';
SELECT participant_id, email FROM participants WHERE participant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT participants.participant_id, participant_name, prize FROM participants JOIN winners ON participants.participant_id = winners.participant_id WHERE prize = 'First Place';
SELECT participant_id, criteria_description FROM participants CROSS JOIN judging_criteria;
SELECT * FROM judging_criteria WHERE criteria_id IN (SELECT winner_id FROM winners);
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_name, painting_title FROM participants WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT participant_name, painting_title, painting_description FROM participants WHERE painting_rank = 1;
SELECT * FROM judging_criteria WHERE weightage > 0.5;
SELECT judge_name, specialization FROM judges ORDER BY judge_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email, painting_title FROM participants WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, painting_title, painting_description FROM participants WHERE painting_title LIKE '%abstract%';
SELECT judge_name, specialization, judge_email FROM judges ORDER BY specialization DESC;
SELECT * FROM participants p JOIN winners w ON p.participant_id = w.participant_id WHERE w.prize_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM Participants;
SELECT participant_name, registration_date FROM Participants WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT judge_id, judge_name FROM Judges ORDER BY judge_experience_years DESC;
SELECT entry_id, painting_title, entry_date FROM Entries WHERE entry_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT entry_id, judge_id, winning_score FROM Winners WHERE winning_score > 90 ORDER BY winning_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Participants;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM Participants WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT judge_name, judge_experience_years FROM Judges WHERE judge_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY judge_experience_years DESC;
SELECT criteria_name, max_points FROM Criteria WHERE criteria_description LIKE '%creativity%';

SELECT Winners.winner_id, Entries.painting_title, Judges.judge_name FROM Winners INNER JOIN Entries ON Winners.entry_id = Entries.entry_id INNER JOIN Judges ON Winners.judge_id = Judges.judge_id WHERE winning_score >= 90 ORDER BY Judges.judge_name ASC, Winners.winner_id DESC;
